 Resets the model system and sets the maximun number of models.
void NE_ModelSystemEnd (void)
 Ends model system and all memory used by it.

Detailed Description

System to create and manipulate animated or static models.

Function Documentation

int NE_ModelAnimGetFrame ( NE_Model *  model  )  [inline]

Returns current frame of an animated model.

Parameters:
model Pointer to the model.

void NE_ModelAnimInterpolate ( NE_Model *  model,
bool  interpolate 
) [inline]

Enables or disables linear interpolation for the drawing of this animated model.

Parameters:
model Pointer to the model.
interpolate [true/false] to enable or disable.
If you enable linear interpolation, the animation will be smoother, but it will need more CPU to be drawn. Disable it if your model has a lot of frames and the animation is quite fast. For example, if you change the model frame each vbl this is useless. Default is true.

void NE_ModelAnimSetFrame ( NE_Model *  model,
int  frame 
) [inline]

Sets current frame of an animated model.

Parameters:
model Pointer to the model.
frame Frame to set.

void NE_ModelAnimSetFrameSpeed ( NE_Model *  model,
int  frame,
int  speed 
) [inline]

Sets speed of a single frame of an animated model. 0 = stop, 1 = slow, 60 = max speed;.

Parameters:
model Pointer to the model.
frame Frame.
speed New speed.

void NE_ModelAnimSetSpeed ( NE_Model *  model,
int  speed 
)

Sets speed of an animated model. 0 = stop, 1 = slow, 60 = max speed;.

Parameters:
model Pointer to the model.
speed New speed.

void NE_ModelAnimStart ( NE_Model *  model,
int  min,
int  start,
int  max,
NE_AnimationTypes  type,
int  speed 
)

Starts the animation of an animated model.

Parameters:
model Pointer to the model.
min Lowest frame possible.
start Start frame.
max Highest frame.
type Animation tipe. [ NE_ANIM_LOOP/NE_ANIM_ONESHOT/NE_ANIM_UPDOWN ]
speed Animation speed. 0 = stop, 1 = slow, 64 = max speed;

void NE_ModelClone ( NE_Model *  dest,
NE_Model *  source 
)

Clone model.

Parameters:
dest Pointer to the destiny model.
source Pointer to the source model.
NOTE: Be careful with this, if you delete source model and try to draw destiny model game will eventually crash. You MUST delete destiny model if you delete source model.

The two models MUST BE THE SAME TYPE!!! (Animated or static)

You should use this if you make a tiled floor, for example, or for making lots of enemies.

Increases rotation of a model.

Parameters:
model Pointer to the model.
rx Rotation by X axis (0 - 511).

rz Rotation by Z axis (0 - 511).

void NE_ModelSystemReset ( int  number_of_models  ) 

Resets the model system and sets the maximun number of models.

Parameters:
number_of_models Number of models. If it is less than 1, it will create space for NE_DEFAULT_MODELS.
